entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023
